mapper.sql: select apply_id, apply_type, document_type, project_id, project_name, company_name, debtor_id,debtor_name, apply_user, apply_time, approve_user, approve_statu, real_create_by, remarks, create_by, creator, create_time, update_by, reviser, update_time, is_return, plan_return_time, real_return_time, out_reason, is_out, is_receive, is_returned, is_received, remarks_out,role_type from sys_apply_in
mapper.select:
SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.document_type, a.project_id, a.project_name, a.company_name, a.debtor_id, a.debtor_name, a.instance_id, a.apply_user, a.apply_time, a.approve_user, a.approve_statu, a.real_create_by, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.creator, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.reviser, a.update_time, a.is_return, a.plan_return_time, a.real_return_time, a.out_reason, a.is_out, a.is_receive, a.is_returned, a.is_received, a.remarks_out, a.role_type, b.user_name as applyUserName, c.user_name as realCreateName, d.user_name as reviserName FROM sys_apply_in a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.apply_user = b.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.real_create_by = c.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.reviser = d.login_name
and a.apply_type = #{applyType} and a.document_type = #{documentType} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and b.user_name like concat('%', #{applyUserName}, '%') and a.project_name like concat('%', #{projectName}, '%') and a.company_name like concat('%', #{companyName}, '%') and a.debtor_name like concat('%', #{debtorName}, '%')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and (a.apply_user = #{applyUser} or (a.real_create_by = #{applyUser} and a.approve_statu='0')) and a.apply_time = #{applyTime} and a.approve_user = #{approveUser} and a.approve_statu = #{approveStatu} and a.creator = #{creator} and a.reviser = #{reviser}
order by a.update_time desc

SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.document_type, a.project_id, a.project_name, a.company_name, a.debtor_id, a.debtor_name, a.instance_id, a.apply_user, a.apply_time, a.approve_user, a.approve_statu, a.real_create_by, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.creator, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.reviser, a.update_time, a.is_return, a.plan_return_time, a.real_return_time, a.out_reason, a.is_out, a.is_receive, a.is_returned, a.is_received, a.remarks_out, a.role_type, b.user_name as applyUserName, c.user_name as realCreateName, d.user_name as reviserName FROM sys_apply_in a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.apply_user = b.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.real_create_by = c.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.reviser = d.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_project_zck ack on a.project_id = ack.project_zck_id
and a.apply_type = #{applyType} and a.document_type = #{documentType} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and b.user_name like concat('%', #{applyUserName}, '%') and a.project_name = #{projectName} and a.company_name = #{companyName} and a.debtor_name like concat('%', #{debtorName}, '%')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and (a.apply_user = #{applyUser} or (a.real_create_by = #{applyUser} and a.approve_statu='0')) and a.apply_time = #{applyTime} and a.approve_user = #{approveUser} and a.approve_statu = #{approveStatu} and a.creator = #{creator} and a.reviser = #{reviser} and a.role_type = #{roleType} and ack.project_zck_type = #{projectZckType}
order by a.update_time desc

SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.document_type, a.project_id, a.project_name, a.company_name, a.debtor_id, a.debtor_name, a.instance_id, a.apply_user, a.apply_time, a.approve_user, a.approve_statu, a.real_create_by, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.creator, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.reviser, a.update_time, a.is_return, a.plan_return_time, a.real_return_time, a.out_reason, a.is_out, a.is_receive, a.is_returned, a.is_received, a.remarks_out, a.role_type, b.user_name as applyUserName, c.user_name as realCreateName, d.user_name as reviserName FROM sys_apply_in a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.apply_user = b.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.real_create_by = c.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.reviser = d.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_project_zck ack on a.project_id = ack.project_zck_id
and a.apply_type = #{applyType} and a.document_type = #{documentType} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and b.user_name like concat('%', #{applyUserName}, '%') and a.project_name like concat('%', #{projectName}, '%') and a.company_name like concat('%', #{companyName}, '%') and a.debtor_name like concat('%', #{debtorName}, '%')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and (a.apply_user = #{applyUser} or (a.real_create_by = #{applyUser} and a.approve_statu='0')) and a.apply_time = #{applyTime} and a.approve_user = #{approveUser} and a.approve_statu = #{approveStatu} and a.creator = #{creator} and a.reviser = #{reviser} and a.role_type = #{roleType} and ack.project_zck_type = #{projectZckType}
order by a.update_time desc

SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.document_type, a.project_id, a.project_name, a.company_name, a.debtor_id, a.debtor_name, a.instance_id, a.apply_user, a.apply_time, a.approve_user, a.approve_statu, a.real_create_by, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.creator, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.reviser, a.update_time, a.is_return, a.plan_return_time, a.real_return_time, a.out_reason, a.is_out, a.is_receive, a.is_returned, a.is_received, a.remarks_out, a.role_type, b.user_name as applyUserName, c.user_name as realCreateName, d.user_name as reviserName FROM sys_apply_in a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.apply_user = b.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.real_create_by = c.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.reviser = d.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_apply_out_detail e on a.apply_id = e.apply_id LEFT JOIN sys_document_file f on f.document_id = e.document_id where a.approve_statu != '0' and a.apply_type = #{applyType} and a.document_type = #{documentType} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and b.user_name like concat('%', #{applyUserName}, '%') and a.project_name like concat('%', #{projectName}, '%') and a.company_name like concat('%', #{companyName}, '%') and a.debtor_name like concat('%', #{debtorName}, '%')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(apply_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and (a.apply_user = #{applyUser} or (a.real_create_by = #{applyUser} and a.approve_statu='0')) and a.apply_time = #{applyTime} and a.approve_user = #{approveUser} and a.approve_statu = #{approveStatu} and a.creator = #{creator} and a.reviser = #{reviser} and f.document_id = #{documentId} order by a.apply_time desc

SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.document_type, a.project_id, a.project_name, a.company_name, a.debtor_name, a.apply_user, a.apply_time, a.approve_user, a.approve_statu, a.real_create_by, a.instance_id, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.creator, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.reviser, a.update_time, a.role_type, b.user_name as applyUserName, c.user_name as realCreateName, d.user_name as reviserName FROM sys_apply_in a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.apply_user = b.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.real_create_by = c.login_name LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.reviser = d.login_name where FIND_IN_SET( #{applyUser},a.approve_user) and a.apply_type = #{applyType} and a.document_type = #{documentType} and a.project_id = #{projectId} and b.user_name like concat('%', #{applyUserName}, '%') and a.project_name like concat('%', #{projectName}, '%') and a.company_name like concat('%', #{companyName}, '%') and a.debtor_name like concat('%', #{debtorName}, '%') and a.apply_time = #{applyTime}
and date_format(a.apply_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(a.apply_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endApplyTime},'%Y%m%d')
and a.approve_statu = #{approveStatu} and a.real_create_by = #{realCreateBy} and a.creator = #{creator} and a.reviser = #{reviser} ORDER BY a.apply_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_apply_in
apply_type, document_type, project_id, project_name, company_name, debtor_id, debtor_name, apply_user, apply_time, approve_user, approve_statu, real_create_by, remarks, create_by, creator, create_time, update_by, reviser, update_time, instance_id, is_return, plan_return_time, real_return_time, out_reason, is_out, is_receive, is_returned, is_received, remarks_out, role_type, in_type,
#{applyType}, #{documentType}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{companyName}, #{debtorId}, #{debtorName}, #{applyUser}, #{applyTime}, #{approveUser}, #{approveStatu}, #{realCreateBy}, #{remarks}, #{createBy}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{reviser}, #{updateTime}, #{instanceId}, #{isReturn}, #{planReturnTime}, #{realReturnTime}, #{outReason}, #{isOut}, #{isReceive}, #{isReturned}, #{isReceived}, #{remarksOut}, #{roleType}, #{inType},
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_apply_in where apply_id in
#{applyId}
